resources.string:
Welcome to Rate Your Pics, an app that allows you to rate your pictures very quickly.

You rate between ★☆☆☆☆ and ★★★★★. The stars will be added as prefix to the filename for easy sorting in any other program or file manager. ☆☆☆☆☆ moves the picture to trash (undo possible during session). That way you will have a clean and quality sorted collection in a very short time. With ← → you can go back and forth (and also change your mind and re-rate during a session or skip a rating). ↺ takes you back to this screen to select a new folder.

To toggle overlay display of stars (after rating) on and off, long-tap the picture in the rating screen.

To start, tap the big red button below "Select Folder", select folder and give permissions.

Your data are yours. Everything is calculated and saved locally. Nothing is sent.
